text: Is there a Julia library/package for linear and nonlinear image registration for medical images? Does such a library or package exist for inputting, reading/writing to medical images?

elements.text: Is there a Julia library/package for linear and nonlinear image registration for medical images? Does such a library or package exist for inputting, reading/writing to medical images?

text: Looks like <https://github.com/timholy/ANTsRegistration.jl>, although not pure Julia
